summary:
Metro Manila, the capital of the Philippines, is a bustling city with over 13 million people. It's made up of 16 cities and one town, all packed into a small area. This region is super important for the country's culture, economy, and government. It's like a hub for everything!

In the 1970s, the government officially made Metro Manila a special area because of its fast growth. They wanted to make sure the city could handle all the people and keep everything running smoothly.
title: Metro Manila
